plot: A film for everyone who wants to find love. A romantic drama about Ben who wants his last day in Gothenburg to be unforgettable.
title: Kärlek 2000
plot_es: A film for everyone who wants to find love. A romantic drama about Ben who wants his last day in Gothenburg to be unforgettable.
plot_en: A film for everyone who wants to find love. A romantic drama about Ben who wants his last day in Gothenburg to be unforgettable.
